mapper.insert: insert into JOB_CUSTOM_WORKER (app_id,ip,port,host_name,zxid,enable) values (#{appId},#{ip},#{port},#{hostname},#{zxid},1) on duplicate key update app_id = IF((#{zxid} > zxid), #{appId}, app_id), host_name = IF((#{zxid} > zxid), #{hostname}, host_name), zxid = IF((#{zxid} > zxid), #{zxid}, zxid), enable = IF((#{zxid} > zxid), 1, enable) ;
